Lugarrio was a hin agent of the Zhentarim in the city of Baldurs Gate in the 15 century DR.
Lugarrio was a halfling with tan skin, brown eyes, curly brown hair, and a trimmed beard. His was was decorated with war paint. He wore leather armor and wielded a blade.
As of the , Lugarrio worked under ranking Zhents Roah Moonglow and Friol, forging sticky alliances with the Guild and the Cult of the Absolute alike. The Guild began suffering losses at the hands of the Stone Lord, so Nine-Fingers Keene rolled dice and hired Zhentarim agents as muscle. Lugarrio was among the Zhents stationed within the Guilds Guildhall in the citys Undercellar. Nine-Fingers, however, did not know that Roah and Friol planned a betrayal. Taking out the Guild meant establishing a Zhentish presence in Baldurs Gate. With the city shuddering under the cults attack, the struggles outcome and Lugarrios fate remained unconfirmed.
